Description:
MUST BE SOLD! Perfect investment starter
This two bedroom unit in need of a little TLC would make the ideal first investment or one to add to the investment portfolio. Structurally sound and attractive exterior appearance you will be amazed what a little paint and soft furnishings will do to this open plan unit. features include lounge with gas wall furnace and air conditioner, timber laminate kitchen with gas appliances, separate laundry leading out to oversized courtyard, large enough for a small dog and garden beds, separate bathroom with shower and vanity and two double bedrooms with built in robes. Single lock up garage with access into backyard.
Darren Cassar : 0438 939 835

Description:
Victorian miners cottage - Circa 1850's
The quintessential Victorian miners cottage
- full of charm and period features. Modern renovations to the home do not take away the feeling of the original 1850's cottage. Two double bedrooms to the front of the home, one with original fireplace, ornate plasterwork and decorative ceiling roses. Through the lined passage way to the open plan lounge with cosy gas log fire, separate dining area and large renovated kitchen with gas appliances, ample preparation and storage areas. The main bathroom with its baltic lined walls and cathedral ceilings are picture perfect. A large chapel window in the bathroom obscured with frosted glass allows ample light into the bathroom. Tucked away behind the cupboards is the european laundry large enough for the washer and dryer. Outside studio in the backyard perfect for teenage retreat, music room or arts room. Completely decked out with split system heating and cooling and fully carpeted. The large entertaining deck toward the rear of the yard is a private and relaxing area for outdoor bbqs or family gatherings. Homes of this history do not come on the market often. Be quick to secure your own piece of Geelong history. Circa 1850.
Darren Cassar : 0438 939 835

Description:
Impressive family home on large allotment
Located on a large allotment (approximately 883sqm) this large BV home will surely impress a family, first home buyer or investor, with a potential rental income of $360/week. Situated minutes from Geelong CBD, Bellarine shopping centre, public transport and local schools, you can't go wrong buying in this location. Comprising open plan kitchen/dining/family plus a large rumpus room ideal for older children. The American Oak kitchen with electric cook top, wall oven and dishwasher overlooks the dining area with a woodheater and sliding door access to the outdoor entertaining area. There are four large bedrooms plus a study, master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite, remaining three each with built in robes. The central bathroom has a bath, separate toilet and separate shower room. There is plenty of off street parking with a large driveway and double carport. Extras include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm system, two storage sheds plus wood shed. Make your enquiries today, homes on this size allotment are very sought after and make a very wise investment choice.

Nothing To Do Except Move In

Boasting 3 generously sized BR's, central bathroom, fully functional kitchen facilities & separate dining that leads into light filled living room with polished floorboards. Extra features include: ducted heating, ceiling fans, SLUG + w/shop all on an allotment of approx 727m2. This home ticks a number of boxes for someone looking to buy in Geelong's next boom suburb. Inspection is a must!

Description:
Better Than Building, Brand New Family Home.
Sale by Set Date 10/5/2012
Why build when you can buy this beautiful family home that's only 2 yrs young and positioned in a new estate. Set on approx 505m2, this property comprises 4 generous sized bedrooms with built in robes (Master with WIR & ensuite), front formal living room, open kitchen/ meals/ living area, central bathroom with sep WC and rumpus room turned theatre.
This stunning property comprises s/s appliances, walk in pantry and DW in the kitchen, linen room, sensational decked alfresco off the meals area, ducted heating, evap cooling, alarm system, established gardens, garden shed and double garage with internal access.
All 29sqs of this home will impress being surrounded by new homes and close proximity to local shops, schools and public transport.
Really must be seen to be appreciated.

A Family Entertainer
Nestled in a quiet court location this Q designer family home will appeal to all. Consisting of 4 large bedrooms, master complete with ensuite & walk in robe. The fully appointed Blackwood timber kitchen and huge family dining room will cater for all your entertaining needs with clever use of space and design. The undercover alfresco area complete with built in BBQ and fernery further enhance the feeling of space and comfort. Other features include separate family room, ducted heating and ducted evaporative cooling throughout the home. With good sized rear yard and double garage. All this situated on a generous 734sm allotment.

Description:
Vendor wants it SOLD!!!
On the fringe of St. Albans Park, here lays an opportunity for the astute purchaser looking for that fantastic purchase. Simply not to be missed & is ideal for first home buyers, those looking to downsize & investors to start or even add to their investment port-folio, with an anticipated rental return of $240-$250p/w & rental demands are very strong in this area. With the high ceilings throughout a real feature, the home comprises of; 3 generous sized bedrooms, spacious lounge with heating & cooling & a renovated fully appointed kitchen which offers plenty of bench & cupboard space. The central bathroom & laundry complete the internal rooms of the home. Once outdoors, the undercover pergola is ideal for those who enjoy entertaining & can also be utilized as a double carport, which is accessed via side gates. Private & secure front & rear yards complete the package. Close to all facilities, amenities, 2 x major shopping centers, education facilities, public transport & is only a short stroll to Buckley's Entertainment Centre. Situated on a low maintenance Smart Block allotment. This is a must see inspection, but at this price don't leave it too long or it will be gone! Call John Pigott on Mobile; 0407 857 606 & book your inspection now!

This comfortable 3 bedroom brick veneer home set on a 546ms block., with a 2 car garage, and 4 car carport this home will be suitable for all needs and budgets. The lounge and dining area have recently been painted in neutral tones, with RC/AC, ceiling fan, and new blinds, this area will appeal to everyone. Located just 5 mins from the CBD, Geelong Waterfront, Eastern gardens and only 20mins to the coastal beaches. With plenty of public transport and several schools and shopping centres in the area
With additional features:
- 3 bedrooms with BIR

- Undercover alfresco with Built in BBQ

- Landscaped garden
- Projected rental return of: $270- $280 per week approx.

Description:
Very Appealing & Well Maintained Brick Home.
Look no further then this perfectly appointed brick home boasting easy access to all amenities. With fine living considerations in mind in central location, the flexible floor plan invites 3 comfortable bedrooms with BIR's, light filled living area, equipped kitchen overlooking dining, central bathroom and separate laundry facilities, heating & A/C, roller shutters, security system and garden shed. Ample off street parking incudes oversized SLUG accompanied by low maintenance garden on a spacious 674m2 approx allotment. Solid and secure in growth locale, this much loved home represents outstanding value for any purchaser including 1st home, downsizer or astute investor.

Description:
“Sun-Soaked Single-Level Style”
With sun, space and sophisticated style, this stand-alone 3 bedroom (plus study) brick home offers convenience and comfort while situated on a very generous allotment. All bedrooms include built in robes, large window space and fresh carpet throughout. The chic family bathroom is centrally located from the bedrooms and includes shower, separate bath and toilet. Spacious light filled family living room with gas wall heater flows through to the separate formal dining room which offers easy access to the outdoor entertaining patio.
The generous kitchen offers a retro feel with electric oven and cook top, fantastic storage and bench top space, tiled splash back and a plethora of natural light. The sunroom creates the perfect space for a study or an extension opportunity. Large laundry room, modern fixtures and fittings, high ceilings, freshly painted and new carpets throughout complete the inside of this charming family abode.
The outdoor entertaining area steps down to the vast rear yard. Picturesque gardens front and back and easy access to the single car garage. Fully fenced and secured, this home offers easy access to public transport, primary and secondary schools, bike tracks and shopping facilities.
Home Owner:
“It's such a perfect position, nice and quiet but close to all the action!”
Roncon Real Estate - An Agency like no other!
Scott Roncon : 0411 685 584

Description:
Best Presented T/House On The Fringe Of St. Albans Park
The heading says it all. Situated in a fantastic little pocket, this is an opportunity not to be missed. Predicted not to be on the market very long & would be ideal for 1st home buyers, investors, or those looking to downsize. This 2BR Townhouse is beautifully presented throughout & appears to be as fresh as the day it was built, which is real credit to the current owner. Upon entering the front door, the property automatically gives you a fantastic impression and that very warm homely feel. Features; 2 double sized BR's, both with BIR's, large lounge, which is complimented by double sliding doors. The fully appointed kitchen offers plenty of bench & cupboard space& the adjoining meals area provides plenty of natural light. Separate bathroom and laundry, also with bench & cupboard space complete the internal rooms of the home. Once outdoors, a very private & secure Nth. facing courtyard awaits, which will certainly get plenty of use now that Summer is fast approaching & overlooks the very neat & tidy garden. There is also a separate area which is secured by a gate, making it great for those who have pets. Car accommodation is taken care of with a remote control SLUG. Additional features include; D/Heating + Split System & 9' Ceilings. Close to all facilities, amenities, shopping centers, schools, sporting grounds& public transport. Call John Pigott on Mobile: 0407 857 606 and book your inspection now!

Genuine Offers Invited - Only 1 Remaining!!!
Building a new home or investment property is now more affordable than ever. This allotment 300m2 approx is on its own title and is awaiting for its new owners to snap up the rare opportunity to secure land in an established area. All Services are connected. Located with easy access to the CBD, schools, shops and public transport. This entry level opportunity into the property market is one not to be missed.

Description:
Modern Townhouse in Popular Thompson St, buy now and Save$$
Looking for a brand new Townhouse, on your own block, with a quality finish throughout required for today's lifestyle without all the hassle of a shared block, well look no further. Be quick and save on stamp duty.
This townhouse situated on 300 m2 is currently being built by one of Geelong's most sought after builders: Morrice Homes. With modern facade, and stylish brick, will certainly impress the most discerning of buyers. Buy now and move into your new home for Christmas.
- Features include: 2 generous bedrooms with BIRs
- Large open plan living and meals area
- Modern Kitchen with dishwasher, pantry and large island bench.
- Single remote garage, with internal access.
- Close to major shops, walking distance to bus stop, sports facilities, and milk bar.
Leesa Van Drunen : 0425 780 132

Description:
Attention first home buyer, investors and downsizes.
This attractive private residence provides a low maintenance lifestyle ideal for downsizing, first home buyers and investors. This neat and tidy two bedroom unit will impress you with its great sense of relaxed serenity and its excellently well maintained gardens.
Offering open plan living with dining, lounge & kitchen, two spacious bedrooms with built in robes, separate bath and shower, toilet, laundry, gas heating and split system heating & cooling. You will be impressed with the neat kitchen complete with gas cooker and good storage space. The home has been freshly painted with new flooring throughout the home. Sliding doors leading onto a private outdoor entertaining area, single lock up garage and off-street parking available. Ideally located close to schools, shops and transport this is a home you will be proud of. A must inspect at this price.
